pages.text: Probably one of the most important things to consider is that to make many things, you'll need to get it a harder way first. Take gears and plates -- all of the 'easy' ways require you to get it the hard way at least once.$(br)Just keep this in mind if ever you've found a weird loophole in the recipes. And maybe I'm dumb, in which case $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/trapese-swinger/issues)report it to me here!$(/l)
Check out this recipe -- the plates look easy but.... look at the recipe for the iron plate (and all plates, really).
